title: People who intentionally surrender at the enemy nexus
body: Just played a match of Ranked solo that my team decided to surrender over someone taking a red buff, while we were destroying their nexus towers. I do not appreciate losing because a 4 man pre-made has all the power over a surrender vote causing me to lose the LP I worked for, over a damned red buff! I have access to video evidence if needed, but I want to see them punished for being such children and ruining the experience for others.

replies.body: Tough life buddy. That's  rather unfortunate...

It is a punishable offence and players do get banned for this kind of stuff (although punishments take a lil longer as they have to be manually reviewed for cases such as this). Be sure to report players like this in the end-game screen, as consistent end of game reporting is the only way to ensure players like this are punished. 

[Here is a recent-ish case of a player being temp banned for exactly this!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/WQdqZQOw-temp-banned-can-riot-email-me-my-chat-log?comment=0004)
